summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2020 LOAD RITE TRAILER. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE REAR LEAF SPRING BOLT HAD DETACHED FROM THE TRAILER. THE TRAILER WAS TAKEN TO THE LOCAL DEALER SMOUSE TRAILERS & SNOW EQUIPMENT (207 SMOUSE RD, MT PLEASANT, PA 15666, (724) 887-7777) TO BE MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT CONTACTED OR INFORMED OF THE FAILURE.
